meanings.definition: A person who has been designated or appointed to a particular position or role.
meanings.sent1: The designee for the team captain was announced today.
meanings.sent2: The company's CEO appointed a new designee to oversee the project.
meanings.sent3: The designee for the office snack provider brought in a basket of assorted treats.
meanings.sent4: She was the designee chosen to represent the group at the conference.
meanings.sent5: The designee for the lead role in the play had to memorize many lines.
